LanguageData.LetterFleebPasses:
A small group of fleebs seems to have wandered into the area.

Fleebs are small, bouncing spongelike creatures. As a part of their biology they produce a clear, purple psychoactive fluid called fleeb juice, as a means of storing energy and to ward off predators.

Unfortunately for them, the properties of their fluids are highly sought after both for recreational and industrial purposes, making them a target for hunters.

The fleebs will leave the area in a few days.
